extension.name: GitHub Feed
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
extension.author: Manuel Häusler
extension.description: A simple module to display GitHub activity for a given repo or a basic profile for a given user

field.name: Owner
field.label: Repo Owner
field.description: Enter the GitHub Username for the repository owner

field.name: CommitImg
field.label: Display Gravatar
field.description: Display User's Gravatar next to each commit/issue?

field.name: DispCommitter
field.label: Display Username
field.description: Display the user name of the committer or issue creator?

field.name: DispRecords
field.label: # Records
field.description: Number of Entries to Display for commits/issues

field.name: IssueLabels
field.label: Displayed Labels
field.description: Enter a comma seperated list of labels to display (i.e. Bug, enhancement etc) or leave blank to show all

field.name: IssueOrder
field.label: Sorting Order
field.description: Order to sort displayed issues in

field.name: JoinedDate
field.label: Date Format
field.description: The format to display signup dates in

field.name: UserListRepos
field.label: List Repos
field.description: Include a list of the users repos (subject to the limit set above)

field.name: UserRepoFilter
field.label: Repo Filter - Exclude
field.description: Enter a comma seperated list of Repository names you wish to hide

field.name: RepoDate
field.label: Date Format
field.description: The format to display Repo Update dates in

field.name: ClssSuffix
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: An additional suffix to add to the module class

field.name: DivSize
field.label: Div Width
field.description: Width in pixels of the div. Set to 0 to let the browser decide

field.name: DateFormat
field.label: Date Format
field.description: The format to display times/dates in

fieldset.name: Caching
fieldset.label: Caching
fieldset.description: mod_bGitHub uses caching to avoid slow page load times.

field.name: CachingEnabled
field.label: Use Cache
field.description: Cache results? Selecting No may slow your page load times

field.name: shortcache
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: Enter a cache time in minutes
